CSL_Aif2DbChannel Struct Reference
AIF2 » AIF2 Data Structures

This is a sub-structure in CSL_Aif2CommonSetup. This structure is used for configuring the parameters of ingress Data Buffer. More...

#include <csl_aif2.h>

Detailed Description

This is a sub-structure in CSL_Aif2CommonSetup. This structure is used for configuring the parameters of ingress Data Buffer.

Field Documentation

Uint8 CSL_Aif2DbChannel::BaseAddress

Channel configuration structure for all 128 channels

Bool CSL_Aif2DbChannel::bEnablePsData

Boolean indicating if the protocol specific data is to be enabled. this is only used for ingress DB

CSL_Aif2DbFifoDepth CSL_Aif2DbChannel::BufDepth

Channel configuration structure for all 128 channels

Uint8 CSL_Aif2DbChannel::ChannelNum

Channel number to be added or changed

CSL_Aif2DbDataSwap CSL_Aif2DbChannel::DataSwap

Big endian, little endian swapping control

Uint8 CSL_Aif2DbChannel::EgressDioOffset

Address offset of SOP for DIO channels

CSL_Aif2DbIqOrder CSL_Aif2DbChannel::IQOrder

Internally changing IQ data order control

Uint8 CSL_Aif2DbChannel::PacketType

Programmable packet type that is inserted into pkt_type field in CPPI Info Word 0. this is only used for ingress DB
